564.text: 戴着防毒面具的士兵正在进行ABC防御课程。
564.text_en: The soldiers wearing gas masks are conducting an ABC defense course.

567.text: 士兵登上一架直升机，作为山地警卫队安全和训练中心（ ZSA ） “山地救援夏季”课程的一部分。
567.text_en: Soldiers board a helicopter as part of the "Mountain Rescue Summer" course at the Center for Security and Training (ZSA) of the Mountain Guard.

569.text: 在山地救援安全与训练中心（ ZSA ）的“山地救援夏季”课程框架内，用缆绳绞车吊起参与者。
569.text_en: A participant is lifted with a cable winch within the framework of the "Mountain Rescue Summer" course at the Center for Safety and Training (ZSA) of the Mountain Rescue.

571.text: 作为山地卫队安全与训练中心（ ZSA ） “山地救援夏季”课程的一部分，包括士兵在内的课程参与者被吊在一起。
571.text_en: Course participants, including soldiers, are hoisted together as part of the "Mountain Rescue Summer" course at the Center for Safety and Training (ZSA) of the Mountain Guard.

572.text: 课程参与者在山地救援服务安全与培训中心（ ZSA ）的山地救援暑期课程中绞车。
572.text_en: Course participants winch as part of the mountain rescue summer course at the Center for Safety and Training (ZSA) of the Mountain Rescue Service.

573.text: 特种部队司令部使用H145M多用途直升机降落在一个地区。
573.text_en: The Special Forces Command lands with the H145M multi-purpose helicopter on an area.

574.text: 特种部队司令部在训练区演示期间使用H145M多用途直升机飞行。
574.text_en: The Special Forces Command flies with the H145M multi-purpose helicopter during a presentation over the training area.

575.text: 新型直升机H145M LUH SOF从直升机中队起飞。
575.text_en: Flight of the new helicopter H145M LUH SOF from the helicopter squadron.

576.text: 新型直升机H145M LUH SOF的训练飞行正在伴随士兵进行中。
576.text_en: A training flight of the new helicopter H145M LUH SOF is underway with accompanying soldiers.

577.text: 使用CH-53运输直升机和空军新型H145M LUH SOF直升机从第64直升机中队起飞。
577.text_en: Flights with the CH-53 transport helicopter and the new H145M LUH SOF helicopter of the air force from the helicopter squadron 64.

578.text: 新型直升机H145M LUH SOF的飞行。
578.text_en: Flight of the new helicopter H145M LUH SOF.

579.text: 一架新的H145M LUH SOF直升机正在为特种部队进行飞行。
579.text_en: A flight of new H145M LUH SOF helicopters is underway for special forces.

580.text: 净化器在净化通道的充分保护下从伤员身上清除有害物质。
580.text_en: Decontaminators remove hazardous substances from a casualty under full protection in the decontamination lane.

581.text: 净化器在净化通道的充分保护下从伤员身上清除有害物质。
581.text_en: Decontaminators remove hazardous substances from a casualty under full protection in the decontamination lane.

583.text: 净化器在穿戴全套防护装备的同时，从净化车道上的受伤人员身上清除有害物质。
583.text_en: Decontaminators remove hazardous substances from an injured person in a decontamination lane while wearing full protective gear.

584.text: 配备全套防护装备的净化器可清除净化车道上的伤员中有害物质。
584.text_en: Decontaminators in full protective gear remove hazardous substances from a casualty on a decontamination lane.

585.text: 一辆豹式2A5主战坦克穿过军事区域的地形。
585.text_en: A Leopard 2A5 main battle tank moves through the terrain of a military area.

586.text: 一辆豹式2A5主战坦克穿过军事区域的地形。
586.text_en: A Leopard 2A5 main battle tank moves through the terrain of a military area.

587.text: 一艘船离开海岸，随后是一艘护卫舰。
587.text_en: A vessel leave the coast, followed by a frigate.

588.text: 士兵在军事训练区的玉米地里。
588.text_en: Soldiers are in a cornfield on a military training area.

592.text: 士兵在军事训练区的玉米地里。
592.text_en: Soldiers are in a cornfield on a military training area.

593.text: 侦察兵在丛林中执行侦察任务。
593.text_en: The scouts carry out reconnaissance missions in the jungle.

595.text: 一名戴着迷彩帽、手持枪支的士兵在军事区的玉米地里执行任务。
595.text_en: A soldier wearing a camouflage cap and holding a gun is on a mission in a cornfield on a military area.

598.text: 一名士兵背着枪穿过绳子障碍物。
598.text_en: A soldier is crossing the rope obstacle with a gun on his back.

605.text: 来自外国海军陆战队步兵团的伞兵在多国行动中使用德国降落伞从直升机降落。
605.text_en: Paratroopers from a foreign marine infantry regiment land from a helicopter using German parachutes in a multinational operation.

606.text: 来自海军陆战队步兵团的伞兵在多国行动中使用德国降落伞从直升机降落。
606.text_en: Paratroopers from a marine infantry regiment land from a helicopter using German parachutes in a multinational operation.

609.text: 一名伞兵跳下直升机执行伞降任务。
609.text_en: A paratrooper jumped off a helicopter to carry out a parachuting mission.

611.text: 伞兵使用德国降落伞执行降落伞任务。
611.text_en: Paratroopers use German parachutes to carry out parachute missions.

613.text: 车辆从运输直升机上卸下。
613.text_en: The vehicle is unloaded from the transport helicopter.

616.text: 直升机在水坝上空飞行。贝尔UH-1D是一种轻型多用途直升机。
616.text_en: Helicopters during a flight over a dam. The Bell UH-1D is a light multi-purpose helicopter.

618.text: 飞行员检查战斗机的发动机。
618.text_en: A pilot checks the engines of a fighter jet.

619.text: 飞行员检查战斗机的仪器。
619.text_en: A pilot checks the instruments of a fighter jet.

621.text: 两名飞行员驾驶欧洲战斗机返回。
621.text_en: Two pilots return with Eurofighter combat jets.

622.text: Fernsp盲她的steigen in den Mehrzweckhubschrauber NH-90 im Rahmen der UN-Mission。
622.text_en: NH-90多用途直升机是联合国任务的一部分。s

623.text: 一辆Marder装甲车穿过一个区域的地形。
623.text_en: A Marder armored vehicle moves through the terrain of an area.

624.text: 作为战术伤员护理任务的一部分，救援队使用NH-90 MedEvac多用途直升机疏散受伤人员。
624.text_en: The rescue team evacuates an injured person with a NH-90 MedEvac multi-purpose helicopter as part of the tactical casualty care mission.

625.text: 作为任务的一部分，一名救援助理使用NH-90 MedEvac多功能直升机降落，以救援和疏散受伤的士兵。
625.text_en: A rescue assistant lands with the NH-90 MedEvac multi-role helicopter to rescue and evacuate injured soldiers as part of the mission.

629.text: 作为任务的一部分， NH-90 MedEvac多用途直升机开始战术伤员后送，以营救和疏散受伤的士兵。
629.text_en: The NH-90 MedEvac multi-role helicopter starts a tactical casualty evacuation to rescue and evacuate injured soldiers as part of the mission.

630.text: 近距离编队飞行的多用途战斗机；外层飞机脱离编队。
630.text_en: Multi-role combat aircraft in close formation flight; the outer aircraft breaks away from the formation.

631.text: 一架多功能直升机沿着海岸飞行。
631.text_en: A multi-role helicopter flies along the coast.

632.text: 新型多用途直升机NH-90 NTH Sea Lion沿海岸飞行。
632.text_en: The new multi-role helicopter NH-90 NTH Sea Lion flies along the coast.

633.text: 新型多用途直升机NH-90沿海岸飞行。
633.text_en: The new multi-role helicopter NH-90 flies along the coast.

634.text: 与士兵一起进行动态演示的多用途直升机NH90。
634.text_en: Multi-purpose helicopter NH90 during a dynamic demonstration with soldiers.

636.text: 开发和制造的飞机被交付给武装部队，后来被转移到另一个国家的武装部队。
636.text_en: The developed and manufactured aircraft was delivered to the armed forces and later transferred to another country's armed forces.

637.text: 这架飞机是在前苏联共和国开发和制造的，并交付给前东欧国家的地面部队。
637.text_en: This aircraft was developed and manufactured in a former Soviet republic and delivered to the ground forces of a former eastern European country.

639.text: 一架海军直升机在完成任务后降落在草坪上。
639.text_en: A naval helicopter landed on the lawn after completing its mission.

640.text_en: The NH-90 transport helicopter drops paratroopers.

641.text: 海军直升机为撤离受保护人员提供支持。
641.text_en: A naval helicopter supports the evacuation of protected persons.

642.text: NH-90运输直升机在军事撤离期间朝某个方向飞行。
642.text_en: The NH-90 transport helicopter flies in a certain direction during a military evacuation.

643.text: NH-90型直升机和海山猫直升机在疏散期间降落在运动场上。
643.text_en: Helicopters of type NH-90 and Sea Lynx land on a sports field during an evacuation.

644.text: 士兵确保空中客车A400M运输机后坡周围环境的安全。
644.text_en: Soldiers secure the surroundings on the rear ramp of the transport aircraft Airbus A400M.

645.text: 机场跑道上停放着一架大型客机。
645.text_en: A large passenger plane is parked on the airport runway.

652.text: 海王和NH-90海狮型直升机在作战期间飞越登陆舰的飞行甲板。
652.text_en: Helicopters of type Sea King and NH-90 NTH Sea Lion fly over the flight deck of a landing ship during an operation.

653.text: 一架空客A400M运输机降落在机场，用于疏散受保护人员。
653.text_en: A transport aircraft Airbus A400M lands for the evacuation of protected persons on a airfield.

657.text: 一名士兵正准备登上海王直升机。
657.text_en: A soldier is preparing to board a Sea King helicopter.

658.text: 一支部队在穿梭交通中用快艇运送到对接船。
658.text_en: A troop is transported with speedboats in shuttle traffic to a docking ship.

661.text: 一名士兵在港口与撤离人员一起保护公共汽车。
661.text_en: A soldier secures the bus with evacuees at the harbor.

662.text: 装甲先锋坦克执行排雷任务。
662.text_en: The armored pioneer tank carries out the mine clearance mission.

664.text: 快艇上的部队与H145M LUH SOF多用途直升机的机组人员一起展示了其能力范围。
664.text_en: The troop on the speedboat demonstrates its capability spectrum alongside the crew of the H145M LUH SOF multi-role helicopter.

665.text: 一个士兵保护他的战友。

666.text: U32潜艇在其夏季旅程中处于海军支援点。
666.text_en: Submarine U32 is at the naval support point in the context of its summer journey.

671.text: 当直升机准备从护卫舰甲板起飞时，军官用桨发出信号。
671.text_en: The officer gives signals with paddles while the helicopter prepares for takeoff from the deck of the frigate.

672.text: 一艘轻型护卫舰发射了一枚海上目标导弹RBS15 Mk3。
672.text_en: A corvette shoots a sea target missile RBS15 Mk3.

674.text: Korvette F 262在导弹发射期间的航拍照片。
674.text_en: Aerial photograph of Korvette F 262 during a missile firing.

675.text: 导弹发射期间Korvette F 262的鸟瞰图。
675.text_en: Aerial view of Korvette F 262 during a missile firing.

676.text: 一艘护卫舰在一个地点附近航行。
676.text_en: A frigate sails in the vicinity of a location.

677.text: 一艘护卫舰从垂直发射系统向无人机目标发射一枚进化海麻雀导弹。
677.text_en: A frigate launches an Evolved Sea Sparrow Missile from the Vertical Launch System on a drone target.

678.text: 中型运输直升机CH 53在山区飞行。
678.text_en: Medium transport helicopter CH 53 in mountain flight.

679.text: 飞行中的中型运输直升机CH 53。
679.text_en: Medium transport helicopter CH 53 in flight.

680.text: 一辆运输车正在将伞兵运送到他们的部署地点。
680.text_en: A transport vehicle is transporting paratroopers to their deployment location.

681.text: 空中机动医疗队在运输直升机前等待医疗车辆从直升机上卸下。
681.text_en: The Air-mobile medical team waits in front of a transport helicopter for the medical vehicle to be unloaded from it.

683.text: 一名伞兵坐在一架正在执行飞行任务的MV-22 B鱼鹰飞机上。
683.text_en: A paratrooper is sitting on a MV-22 B Osprey aircraft that is on a flight mission.

685.text: 一个戴着雪盔的战士正在村子里行动。
685.text_en: A warrior wearing a snow helmet is operating in a village.

689.text: 一名士兵驾驶一辆履带式车辆。
689.text_en: A soldier handles a tracked vehicle.

690.text: 船员已带着威塞尔牵引武器运载工具撤回指定区域。
690.text_en: The crew has withdrawn into their designated area with their Wiesel TOW weapon carrier.

692.text: 由一家游泳桥公司驾驶M3两栖动物在河对岸进行日出两栖作业。
692.text_en: Amphibious operation at sunrise across the river with an M3 amphibian by a swim bridge company.

693.text: 日出时分，乘坐两栖车M3通过游泳桥公司在河上运营渡轮。
693.text_en: Ferry operation at sunrise across the river with the amphibious vehicle M3 through the swimming bridge company.

694.text: 先锋队在他们的车辆旁等待拾取，而豹2坦克同时攻击。
694.text_en: Pioneers wait for pickup by their vehicle while Leopard 2 tanks simultaneously attack.

695.text: 一个狙击手和一个观察者在一起。
695.text_en: A sniper and a spotter are together.

696.text: 从装甲运输车EAGLE V使用遥控轻武器站（ FLW 100 ， MG3 ）射击。
696.text_en: Shooting with the remotely controlled light weapons station (FLW 100, MG3) from the armored transport vehicle EAGLE V.

907.text: 作为执行任务后撤回德国的一部分，士兵将材料装载到安东诺AN-124运输机上。
907.text_en: Soldiers load material into an Antonow AN-124 transport plane as part of the withdrawal to Germany after a mission.

908.text: 士兵在任务“坚定支援”后，将材料装载到安东诺AN-124型运输机上，作为撤退到德国的一部分。
908.text_en: Soldiers load material into a transport plane of type Antonow AN-124 as part of the withdrawal to Germany after the mission Resolute Support.

909.text: 士兵正在将物资装载到一架AN-124运输机上。
909.text_en: Soldiers are loading supplies onto an AN-124 transport aircraft.

910.text: 一名士兵骑着自行车穿过营地。
910.text_en: A soldier rides a bicycle through a camp.

917.text: 士兵用爱国者发射器将车辆从行动区转移到地中海港口。
917.text_en: Soldiers relocate vehicles with Patriot launchers from the area of operation to a Mediterranean harbor.

918.text: 士兵从地中海港口的作战区域装载车辆。
918.text_en: Soldiers load vehicles from the operational area at a Mediterranean harbour.

920.text: 驾驶舱驾驶员指挥战斗机降落在护卫舰上。
920.text_en: The flight deck officer directes the fighter jet to land on the frigate.

921.text: 降落时，士兵拿着枪，背着背包。
921.text_en: The soldier holds a gun and carry his backpack during a landing.

922.text: 士兵们在成功渡河后用M3两栖动物重建了一座桥梁。
922.text_en: Soldiers rebuild a bridge with an M3 amphibian after a successful river crossing.

924.text: 罗马尼亚军队使用M3两栖动物在河上建造了一座浮桥。
924.text_en: The Romanian army used M3 amphibian to build a pontoon bridge over the river.

926.text: 在恶劣的道路上行驶时，乘坐环卫应急车辆。
926.text_en: On the move with a sanitation emergency vehicle on a bad road.

927.text: Panzerhaubitze 2000的船员在战斗群训练期间提供火炮火力支援。
927.text_en: Crew of a Panzerhaubitze 2000 provides artillery fire support during battle group training.

929.text: 一名射手在军事基地的树木繁茂和城市地形上进行步兵战斗。
929.text_en: A marksman is in infantry combat in wooded and urban terrain on a military ground.

931.text: 一名神枪手在军事基地的树木繁茂和城市地形上进行步兵战斗。
931.text_en: A sharpshooter engages in infantry combat in wooded and urban terrain on a military ground.

933.text: 一名神枪手在军事训练场上在树木繁茂的城市地形上进行步兵战斗。
933.text_en: A sharpshooter engages in infantry combat in wooded and urban terrain on a military training ground.

934.text: 射手在军事训练区的树木繁茂和城市地形上进行步兵战斗。
934.text_en: Marksmen engage in infantry combat in wooded and urban terrain on a military training area.

936.text: 一名狙击手和一名侦察兵正在合作进行步兵武装战斗训练。
936.text_en: A sniper and a scout are cooperating in infantry armed combat training.

937.text: 一名狙击手用新款Scharfsch tzengewehr G22A2远距离眉射击。
937.text_en: A sniper shoots at long distances with the new Scharfsch眉tzengewehr G22A2.

953.text: 一名士兵用MG5机枪射击，而另一名携带G36的士兵观察周围环境。
953.text_en: A soldier shoots with the MG5 machine gun while another soldier with a G36 observes the surroundings.

954.text: 一名士兵在两脚架上用MG5射击。
954.text_en: A soldier shoots with the MG5 on a bipod.
